description: 1337x is a Public torrent site that offers verified torrent downloads
name: 1337x

fields.name: baseUrl
fields.label: Base Url
fields.helpText: Select which base url Prowlarr will use for requests to the site

fields.name: baseSettings.queryLimit
fields.label: Query Limit
fields.helpText: The number of max queries as specified by the respective unit that Prowlarr will allow to the site

fields.name: baseSettings.grabLimit
fields.label: Grab Limit
fields.helpText: The number of max grabs as specified by the respective unit that Prowlarr will allow to the site

fields.name: baseSettings.limitsUnit
fields.label: Limits Unit
fields.helpText: The unit of time for counting limits per indexer

fields.name: torrentBaseSettings.appMinimumSeeders
fields.label: Apps Minimum Seeders
fields.helpText: Minimum seeders required by the Applications for the indexer to grab, empty is Sync profile's default

fields.name: torrentBaseSettings.seedRatio
fields.label: Seed Ratio
fields.helpText: The ratio a torrent should reach before stopping, empty uses the download client's default. Ratio should be at least 1.0 and follow the indexers rules

fields.name: torrentBaseSettings.seedTime
fields.label: Seed Time
fields.helpText: The time a torrent should be seeded before stopping, empty uses the download client's default

fields.name: torrentBaseSettings.packSeedTime
fields.label: Pack Seed Time
fields.helpText: The time a pack (season or discography) torrent should be seeded before stopping, empty is app's default

fields.name: torrentBaseSettings.preferMagnetUrl
fields.label: Prefer Magnet URL
fields.helpText: When enabled, this indexer will prefer the use of magnet URLs for grabs with fallback to torrent links

fields.name: info_uploader
fields.label: About filtering by Uploader
fields.value:
You can filter by Uploader by entering a Case Sensitive username, or leave empty to get all results.
Note: this is the username of the Uploader and not the Groupname that often show up at the end of 1337x titles, eg -GalaxyRG.

fields.name: info_flaresolverr
fields.label: FlareSolverr Info
fields.value: This site may use Cloudflare DDoS Protection, therefore Prowlarr requires FlareSolverr to access it.

fields.name: info_download
fields.label: About the Download links
fields.value: As the iTorrents .torrent download link on this site is known to fail from time to time, we suggest using the magnet link as a fallback. The BTCache and Torrage services are not supported because they require additional user interaction (a captcha for BTCache and a download button on Torrage.)

fields.name: disablesort
fields.label: Disable sorting - 1337x prevents sorting searches during high server load, which breaks the indexer when performing a keyword search - disable if you get zero results

fields.name: info_download
fields.label: About the Download links
fields.value: As the .torrent download links on this site are known to fail from time to time, you can optionally set as a fallback an automatic alternate link.

fields.name: info_category_8000
fields.label: About LimeTorrents Categories
fields.value:
LimeTorrents only returns category Other in its Keywordless search results page.
To pass your apps' indexer TEST you will need to include the 8000(Other) category.

fields.name: strip_s01

fields.name: radarr_compatibility
fields.label: Improve Radarr compatibility by removing year information from keywords and adding it to Release Titles

fields.name: info_api

fields.value: This indexer uses the API at https://apibay.org/ to get its official TPB data. Choose any site link that you can access/prefer so that you can view the torrent details page when browsing the search results for this indexer.
